projects.title: apro go
details: Ongoing side project that suggest online collaborating tools to small teams / organizations based on members personality.
Collaborating with 9 team members from ideation to implement product.
Following agile process to implement each pages & functions.
Implement profile page & recommendation page.
Using storybook for testing components and pages.

projects.title: hipeak
details: Hipeak Creative website collaborate with web designer.
Using Gatsby for fast static website.
Hoisting and deployed using AWS S3, Route53 and Cloudfront.
Implementing mail service using AWS SES, Ramda function.

projects.title: caron
details: Caron automotive website based in Tauranga.
Request from caron automotive manager, experiencing design to hoisting and deployment.
Using Gatsby for fast static website.
Hoisting and deployed using AWS S3, Route53 and Cloudfront.

projects.title: netclix
details: Netflic redesign website that user can login, subscribe and see trailers.
Implement server side rendering for better user experience.
Implement login function using firebase authentication.
Implement payment system using firebase & stripe.
Managing data using Recoil.

projects.title: Noted
details: Simple note app that users can write notes about their daily life.
Managing data using redux / redux actions.
Using both redux saga / thunk to fetch weather data from Openweatherapi.

projects.title: Cryptok
details: Cryptocurrency website that show cryptocurrencies and related news to users using coinranking and Bing new API.
Using redux to manage states from two other API.
Using Chart.js to show cryptocurrency states to the user.
Implement design using Ant design, but need to improve on responsive design
